You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X
X X ▢ ▢ X
X ▢ X ▢ X
X ▢ ▢ X X
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X

DESCRIPTION: The grid is 5 rows by 5 columns. The top row has an X at the beginning and end, with three empty squares in between. The second row has an X at the beginning, middle, and end, with two empty squares in between. The third row has an X at the beginning, middle, and end, with one empty square in between. The fourth row has an X at the beginning and end, with two empty squares in between and an X in the fourth column. The fifth row has an X at the beginning and end, with three empty squares in between.
